definitions: inability to be to bent or be forced out of shape

examples.text: the tough substance that gives plants their rigidity

shortDefinitions: inability to be to bent or be forced out of shape

definitions: inability to be changed or adapted

examples.text: the rigidity of the school system

shortDefinitions: inability of being unable to be changed or adapted

definitions: unwillingness to be adaptable in outlook, belief, or response

examples.text: there was a regrettable rigidity in this decision

shortDefinitions: unwillingness to be adaptable in outlook, belief, or response
